mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS 'cartId', ci.id AS 'cartItemId', ci.quantity AS 'quantity', ci.product_id AS 'productId', p.full_name AS 'productName', p.stock - p.allocated_stock AS 'stock', p.price AS 'price', p.market_price AS 'marketPrice', CONCAT(#{imageUrl},p.image) AS 'image', ci.quantity * p.price AS 'subtotal', p.app_is_marketable AS 'isMarketable' FROM mem_member m INNER JOIN cart c ON m.id = c.member_id INNER JOIN cart_item ci ON c.id = ci.cart_id INNER JOIN product p ON ci.product_id = p.id WHERE m.username = #{userName} ORDER BY ci.create_date DESC
